attributes.action: Call an immediate general election after the third resignation of a conservative
attributes.additional_details: It is obvious that the Conservatives fail to act in their constituents best interest and only there own self interest. Furthermore there disconnect from what it is like to live as a normal citizen of this country is only adding to their continued failure.
attributes.background: The Tory party is a mess, it is clear they are not fit to govern our country through these trying times. They fail to act in the best interest of the people, the only democratic solution is to call a general election and let the citizens of this country amend the damage caused.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
